title: Managing creatively
creator_credit: David Evans, Millbank Films and Ron Tanner
brief_description: Tells the story of a manager whose creativity is stifled at work. Shows how he crosses the barriers which block his creativity and how he finds he can release his own ideas and the ideas of others for productive work.
creator_credit_for_label: David Evans, Millbank Films and Ron Tanner
